bio: Pascal (Flutter GDE) had a 6-year-long Android background before he transitioned to ditch Kotlin for Dart and Flutter. At PHNTM he leads a team of Flutter talents delivering stunning user interfaces to audiences on all platforms. Pascal is a strong believer in testing and open-source. If you find any of his packages in your dependencies they are certainly well tested. Like his Feedback SDK Wiredash.
title: Flutter GDE, CTO at PHNTM, Co-Founder of Wiredash
name: Pascal Welsch
shortBio: Pascal (Flutter GDE) had a 6-year-long Android background before he transitioned to ditch Kotlin for Dart and Flutter.
